title: Sweet and sour prawns
time: Takes 15 minutes to make, 10 minutes to cook
description: Sweet and sour prawns are a traditional Chinese recipe. Forget the local takeaway, these are so quick and easy to make at home.
ingredients: 2 tbsp cornflour mixed with 2 tbsp water
425g can pineapple pieces, drained, juice reserved
Knob of fresh ginger, finely grated
2 red chillies, deseeded, 1 finely diced and 1 sliced
4 spring onions, sliced lengthways, to serve

method.Step 1: Mix the vinegar with the soy sauce, sugar, cornflour mix, pineapple juice and 100ml water.

method.Step 2: Heat a wok over a high heat, then add the oil, garlic, ginger and diced chilli. Stir-fry for 30 seconds, then add the pepper, pineapple and water chestnuts.

method.Step 3: Cook for 2 minutes, add the sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.

method.Step 4: Add the prawns, stirring for 2-3 minutes more until cooked. Serve sprinkled with spring onion and sliced chilli.
